name: Married at First Sight: The First Year
original_name: Married at First Sight: The First Year
overview: Follow the two couples who remained married at the end of season one of Married at First Sight, Jason Carrion and Cortney Hendrix; and Doug Hehner and Jamie Otis, as they embark on life after the experiment.

episodes.name: Family Past and Present
episodes.overview: Jason and Cortney deal with the loss of his Mom. Jamie and Doug are excited to move to New Jersey but are surprised by an unwelcome family member.

episodes.name: Have Your Cake and Eat it Too
episodes.overview: Cortney finally reveals to Jason that she's losing her job. Jamie plans a surprise party for Doug's birthday. Monet is setup on a blind date.

episodes.name: Baby Fever
episodes.overview: Jamie continues to press Doug about having children. Jason risks his career by returning to the wrestling ring. Monet has a surprise date.

episodes.name: New York's Bravest
episodes.overview: Jason's graduation from the fire academy is finally here, and he realizes that Cortney's support is why he's made it this far.

episodes.name: We Found Love
episodes.overview: Jamie and Doug get together with Cortney and Jason for a date night in the city. The newlyweds reminisce about their favorite romantic memories, as they view scenes from their first year of marriage.

episodes.name: Turkey Days
episodes.overview: Jason and Cortney continue arguing over their Thanksgiving plans. With Jason working, will Cortney spend the day by herself?

episodes.name: Naughty or Nice
episodes.overview: Cortney and Jason have had some issues as of late, so maybe a risqu√© Christmas present will get them back on the same page.

episodes.name: What Happens In Vegas
episodes.overview: Jason and Cortney try to rebound from their fight with a trip to Las Vegas to celebrate the bachelor and bachelorette parties they never had since they met at the altar.

episodes.name: All Shook Up
episodes.overview: With Jason and Cortney in Las Vegas, a wedding is in the works. There's so much to do and so little time to do it.

episodes.name: Doug & Jamie's Wedding Special
episodes.overview: After the proposal, Jamie finally gets the chance to plan the wedding of her dreams and walk down the aisle to Doug with "happy tears" this time.

episodes.name: Bucket List
episodes.overview: Doug and Jamie make a pre-baby bucket list and celebrate Jamie's birthday. Cortney teaches Jason how to do make-up for movie sets. Jason's best friend, Neph, finds love in Las Vegas.

episodes.name: Greener Grass
episodes.overview: Jamie and Doug hit a rocky patch in their relationship. Cortney and Jason open up to each other about past pain. Neph and family prepare for his long distance girlfriend moving in.

episodes.name: Not Cool Jamie
episodes.overview: Jamie and Doug meet with Dr. Pepper about their recent bickering. Neph surprises Jasmine at the airport. Jason confides in Neph that he has half-siblings, but his best friend is in not as supportive as he would like.

episodes.name: Wrong Path In Life
episodes.overview: Jamie tells Doug about having feelings for her ex-boyfriend, causing him to question the relationship. Neph has a birthday party where Jason and Cortney get to the bottom of how Jasmine is doing in New York City.

episodes.name: This Is Something Serious
episodes.overview: Jamie takes Doug fencing for his pre-baby bucket list, but things turn serious when they argue on their way to her sister's party in upstate New York.

episodes.name: Hijinks
episodes.overview: Cortney shows Jason where she grew up in North Carolina in hopes he'll want to move there someday. Neph tries to help Jasmine acclimate to the New York lifestyle.

episodes.name: Slap In The Face
episodes.overview: Jamie sets up a meeting with Doug and her ex-boyfriend. Jasmine leaves New York. Cortney helps Jason uncover information about his family and take the next step to find them.

episodes.name: You Need Therapy
episodes.overview: Jason gets a message from his estranged sister and plans a memorial art show for his mom. Doug struggles to show Jamie he cares about her family. Dr. Pepper calls out Jamie for not seeing a therapist about her troubled past.

episodes.name: Ghosts in the Closet
episodes.overview: Jamie and Doug go on a ghost hunt; Dr. Pepper advises Cortney on controlling her rage; Jason surprises Cortney with a trip.
